snippet.title: Mario Super Sluggers - Intro Cutscene [1080p]
snippet.description:
This video shows the full opening movie of Mario Super Sluggers (Mario Baseball). This game was released on Wii and Wii U.

For more Mario Games check out ► https://www.youtube.com/c/PlatformGems/playlists?view=1&flow=grid

SUBSCRIBE ❤ https://www.youtube.com/c/PlatformGems?sub_confirmation=1
If you liked the video please remember to leave a Like & Comment, I appreciate it a lot!

TWITTER 🐤 https://twitter.com/GemsPlatform
FACEBOOK ❤ https://www.facebook.com/GemsPlatform
INSTAGRAM 📸 https://www.instagram.com/platformgems

🎮 Mario Party 4
https://youtu.be/Eur1HPFtWSs?list=PLzkpp_iwUUfOwKHIc6mfZg3N9jeJR8-Ca

🎮 Mario Party 9
https://youtu.be/0C0pi9xDAVw?list=PLzkpp_iwUUfNY2Q24FlxrYmWFNK26gAHJ

🎮 Mario Party The Top 100
https://youtu.be/M2mptYWoG04?list=PLzkpp_iwUUfMl1wEtzflWhjJu4oF6aYc7

🎮 Super Mario 3D World
https://youtu.be/hqnF1DdRbw0?list=PLzkpp_iwUUfOpgjQQxNFAL9uuB160RJvi

🎮 Wario World
https://youtu.be/mKc8Oa4zDNg?list=PLzkpp_iwUUfMSeX-2K7Qu8a01u9PQZvJY


⭐ No Commentary Gameplay by Platform Gems ⭐

Every single video on this channel captured by myself using NVIDIA ShadowPlay or Elgato 4K60 Pro MK.2, depending on whether I'm playing on a PC or a game console (I usually capture in 2K or 4K). There are no unedited videos on this channel, I edit each video myself, cut out loading screens and starting menus, remove all mistakes and some tedious moments, to make the best and most fluid viewing experience possible and help others. I work the hardest possible to provide you the best gaming help. All games are posted with permission from the owners.

I also do unboxing videos and reviews of games, I do not allow for my content to be uploaded or used without my permission. You can contact me on my twitter page listed above for any queries.


#MarioSuperSluggers
